item.title: 苹果推出助听器功能后，助听器制造商业绩下滑，分析师认为威胁不大
item.description: 在苹果推出助听器功能后，欧洲助听器制造商的股票在周二早盘交易中下滑。【原文：Shares in European hearing aid makers slipped in early trading on Tuesday after Apple rolled out hearing aid features.】

item.title: 西班牙降雨影响 Inditex 销售增长预期
item.description: 分析师和投资者在周三发布财报前表示，Zara 所有者 Inditex 对第二季度销售额大幅增长的预期因其最大市场西班牙 6 月份的湿冷天气而落空。【原文：Expectations of bumper second quarter sales growth at Zara owner Inditex have been dashed by a wet and cold June in its biggest market of Spain, analysts and investors said ahead of earnings due on Wednesday.】

item.title: 行业组织称德国化工行业第二季度复苏势头减弱
item.description: 德国化学工业协会（VCI）周二发布的一份报告称，由于 4-6 月份国内外订单放缓，尤其是医药行业，德国化工行业在第二季度失去了略微复苏的势头。【原文：A slight recovery in the German chemicals sector lost momentum in the second quarter, a report by the VCI industry body said on Tuesday, as both domestic and foreign orders slowed in the April-June period, especially in the pharmaceutical branch.】

item.title: 日本松下结束长达 37 年的奥运会顶级赞助商合约
item.description: 日本松下控股公司周二表示，将在巴黎奥运会结束后终止其作为奥运会顶级赞助商长达 37 年的合同。【原文：Japan's Panasonic Holdings said on Tuesday it would end its 37-year contract as a top sponsor for the Olympics following the end of the Paris Games.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，欧盟将降低对特斯拉和其他来自中国的电动汽车征收关税的提议
item.description: 彭博新闻社周二援引知情人士的话报道称，欧盟将降低对特斯拉和其他来自中国的电动汽车（EV）征收关税的提议。【原文：The European Union will lower proposed tariffs on Tesla and other electric vehicles (EVs) from China, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧盟法院维持对谷歌处以 27 亿美元欧盟反垄断罚款的判决
item.description: 欧洲最高法院周二维持了欧盟七年前对 Alphabet 旗下谷歌公司处以的 24.2 亿欧元（合 26.7 亿美元）反垄断罚款，原因是谷歌利用自己的比价购物服务获得了对欧洲较小竞争对手的不公平优势。【原文：Europe's top court on Tuesday upheld a 2.42 billion euro ($2.67 billion) EU antitrust fine imposed on Alphabet's Google seven years ago for using its own price comparison shopping service to gain an unfair advantage over smaller European rivals.】

item.title: 苹果公司在与欧盟向爱尔兰发出的 130 亿欧元征税令的斗争中败下阵来
item.description: 欧洲最高法院周二维持了欧盟七年前对 Alphabet 旗下谷歌公司处以的 24.2 亿欧元反垄断罚款，原因是该公司利用自身的比价购物服务获得了对欧洲较小竞争对手的不公平优势。【原文：Europe's top court on Tuesday upheld a 2.42 billion euro EU antitrust fine imposed on Alphabet's Google seven years ago for using its own price comparison shopping service to gain an unfair advantage over smaller European rivals.】

item.title: 中国抨击美国针对生物技术公司的法案具有 "歧视性
item.description: 中国外交部周二表示，美国通过一项法案，旨在限制与无锡艾普泰克、BGI 和其他生物技术公司的业务往来，这是对中国公司的 "歧视性 "措施。【原文：The United State's passage of a bill that aims to restrict business with Wuxi AppTec , BGI and other biotech firms was a "discriminatory" measure against Chinese companies, China's foreign ministry said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 英国基金公司施罗德（Schroders）和艾伯敦（Abrdn）任命新任首席执行官，重启颓势
item.description: 英国基金管理公司施罗德（Schroders）和艾伯敦（Abrdn）周二任命了新的首席执行官，在投资者情绪低迷和全球市场不安的背景下，两位内部人士被委以重启各自公司业绩的重任。【原文：British fund managers Schroders and Abrdn named new chief executives on Tuesday, handing two insiders the task of rebooting performance at their respective firms against a backdrop of skittish investor sentiment and uneasy global markets.】

item.title: 德国通胀降至三年多来最低水平
item.description: 周二的第二次估计证实，德国8月份的通胀率降至三年多来的最低水平，这使得欧洲中央银行本周更容易降息。【原文：German inflation fell to its lowest level in more than three years in August, a second estimate confirmed on Tuesday, making it easier for the European Central Bank to cut interest rates this week.】

item.title: 华为威胁逼近，苹果新 iPhone 的人工智能差距令中国用户失望
item.description: 周二，苹果公司在中国发布的新款 iPhone 因缺乏人工智能功能而遭到抨击，这对这家美国巨头来说是一个挑战，因为它要在全球最大的智能手机市场上与华为技术公司（HWT.UL）展开日益激烈的竞争。【原文：Apple's new iPhone launch drew scorn on Tuesday for its lack of artificial intelligence features in China, a challenge for the U.S. giant as it battles growing competition from Huawei Technologies (HWT.UL) in the world's largest smartphone market.】

item.title: 万宝盛华集团调查显示，第四季度全球招聘意向保持稳定
item.description: 万宝盛华集团发布的《雇佣前景调查》显示，尽管2024年第四季度的雇佣前景弱于2023年最后一个季度，但企业的全球招聘意向预计将保持稳定。【原文：Companies' global hiring intentions are expected to hold steady in the fourth quarter of 2024, even though the outlook for the quarter ahead was weaker than the final quarter of 2023, ManpowerGroup's Employment Outlook Survey showed.】

item.title: 美国大选只是紧张股市面临的众多风险之一
item.description: 期权市场显示，美股反弹面临的风险越来越大，刺激了投资组合套期保值的需求，因为投资者正在努力应对美国经济的不确定性、美联储政策的变化以及迫在眉睫的总统大选。【原文：Growing risks to the U.S. stock rally are spurring demand for portfolio hedging, options markets showed, as investors grapple with U.S. economic uncertainty, shifting Federal Reserve policy and a looming presidential election.】

item.title: 中国汽车供应商和电动汽车制造商涌入德国大型展会
item.description: 近 900 家中国汽车供应商和少数几家电动汽车制造商正在法兰克福的一个展会上展示他们的产品，因为中国的汽车行业正在挑战迫在眉睫的贸易壁垒，以扩大其全球足迹，应对国内利润率的下降。【原文：Nearly 900 Chinese auto suppliers and a handful of EV makers are showcasing their products at a trade fair in Frankfurt as the country's car sector defies looming trading barriers to expand its global footprint and counter eroding profitability at home.】

item.title: 早间竞标中国阴霾笼罩华尔街引领的反弹
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 野村证券向对冲基金伸出橄榄枝，市场收入超预期
item.description: 野村控股的全球市场主管告诉路透社，野村控股正着眼于交易业务更强劲的收入增长，未来三年的增幅可能高达 30%，因为野村控股正重新推动其对冲基金业务的发展。【原文：Nomura Holdings is eyeing stronger revenue growth in trading, which could increase by as much as 30% over the next three years, as it makes a renewed push to grow its business serving hedge funds, its head of global markets told Reuters.】

item.title: 日本收购方如何在美国钢铁公司竞购案中误读政治，无视警告信号
item.description: 就在新日铁发现其 150 亿美元收购美国钢铁公司的计划即将被美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）否决的一个月前，这家日本公司收到了一个强烈的暗示，事情正在发生转折。【原文：A month before Nippon Steel discovered its $15 billion takeover of U.S. Steel was on the brink of being torpedoed by President Joe Biden, the Japanese company received a strong hint that things were taking a turn for the worse.】

item.title: 中国出口高于预期，但进口因国内需求低迷而令人失望
item.description: 8 月份，中国出口创下 2023 年 3 月以来的最快增速，表明制造商正在赶在越来越多的贸易伙伴加征关税之前发出订单，而进口则因国内需求疲软而未达预期。【原文：China's exports grew at their fastest pace since March 2023 in August, suggesting manufacturers are rushing out orders ahead of tariffs expected from a growing number of trade partners while imports missed forecasts amid weak domestic demand.】

item.title: 澳大利亚审慎监管机构打算取代银行的混合资本
item.description: 澳大利亚审慎监管机构周二建议用更可靠、成本更低的资本形式取代银行混合债券，因为散户投资者持有混合证券的比例不断上升，构成了金融稳定风险。【原文：Australia's prudential regulator proposed to replace bank hybrid bonds with more reliable and less expensive forms of capital on Tuesday, as rising ownership of hybrid securities among retail investors poses a financial stability risk.】

item.title: 华为发布三折智能手机，在中国与苹果展开竞争
item.description: 中国华为技术公司（HWT.UL）周二推出一款三向可折叠手机，力图凭借在中国市场大受欢迎的新外形设计，扩大其在全球最大智能手机市场对苹果的领先优势。【原文：China's Huawei Technologies (HWT.UL) unveils a three-way foldable phone on Tuesday, as it seeks to widen its lead over Apple in the world's biggest smartphone market with a new form factor that has gained popularity in the China market.】

item.title: 亚洲股市上涨，关注美国通胀测试和美联储会议
item.description: 继华尔街隔夜大涨之后，亚洲股市周二扭转了早盘的跌势，小幅上扬，尽管对仍在挣扎的中国经济的担忧抑制了市场情绪。【原文：Asian stocks reversed early losses to rise marginally on Tuesday following Wall Street's overnight rally, though concerns about a still-struggling Chinese economy kept sentiment in check.】

item.title: 从秘鲁到图瓦卢：世界银行总裁称全球贷款人必须改变
item.description: 世界银行行长阿贾伊-班加（Ajay Banga）周二在访问了从秘鲁到图瓦卢的 27 个国家后发表讲话说，在这个两极分化日益严重的世界，全球贷款机构需要加快工作速度并简化流程。【原文：World Bank President Ajay Banga said in a speech on Tuesday after visiting 27 countries from Peru to Tuvalu that the global lender needs to work faster and simplify its processes in a world experiencing greater polarisation.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 8 月就业前景恶化，企业经营状况创两年半新低
item.description: 周二的一项调查显示，澳大利亚8月份的商业状况跌至两年半以来的最低点，就业前景受到打击，而有关通胀压力减弱的消息喜忧参半。【原文：Australian business conditions fell to the lowest in 2-1/2 years in August with the outlook for jobs taking a hit, a survey showed on Tuesday, while there was mixed news on inflation pressures subsiding.】

item.title: 弗朗辛风暴造成的供应中断抵消了需求疲软的影响，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 周二早盘，由于投资者权衡了热带风暴 "弗朗辛 "造成的供应中断和进一步减产的可能性，以及持续疲软的中国需求，石油价格持稳。【原文：Oil was steady in early trade on Tuesday as investors weighed supply disruptions from Tropical Storm Francine and the potential for further output cuts against persistently weak Chinese demand.】

item.title: 官员称波音劳资协议在投票前激怒了许多工会员工
item.description: 一位负责谈判的官员周一表示，波音公司与其最大的工会之一达成的一份临时劳动合同激怒了许多工人，他们希望获得更高的工资涨幅和更好的养老金。【原文：A tentative labor contract agreed between Boeing and one of its biggest unions has angered many workers who were hoping for higher wage hikes and better pensions, an official who negotiated the deal said on Monday.】

item.title: 三星 SDI 将以 8.36 亿美元向中国公司出售偏光片业务
item.description: 韩国电池制造商三星 SDI 周二表示，已决定以 1.12 万亿韩元（8.3647 亿美元）的价格将其偏光膜业务出售给中国无锡恒芯光电材料有限公司。【原文：South Korean battery maker Samsung SDI said on Tuesday it had decided to sell its polarizing film business to China's Wuxi Hengxin Optoelectronic Materials for 1.12 trillion won ($836.47 million).】

item.title: 美国众议院通过法案限制与中国药明康德和 BGI 的业务往来
item.description: 美国众议院周一通过了一项法案，旨在以国家安全为由限制与中国药明康德、BGI 和其他几家生物技术公司的业务往来。【原文：The U.S. House of Representatives on Monday passed a bill that aims to restrict business with China's WuXi AppTec , BGI and several other biotech companies on national security grounds.】

item.title: 美国法院官员采取行动阻止债权人使 Citgo 拍卖脱轨
item.description: 一名负责监督委内瑞拉炼油商 Citgo Petroleum 母公司股份拍卖的美国联邦法院官员周一要求该案的法官阻止债权人提起更多诉讼，以免破坏销售进程。【原文：A U.S. federal court officer overseeing an auction of shares in the parent of Venezuela-owned refiner Citgo Petroleum on Monday asked the judge in the case to prevent creditors from pursuing additional lawsuits that could derail the sales process.】

item.title: 惠普为收购瞻博网络发行 13.5 亿美元可转换股票，股价下跌
item.description: 惠普企业（Hewlett Packard Enterprise）股价在盘后交易中下跌 6.4%，此前这家人工智能服务器制造商宣布发行 13.5 亿美元的强制可转换优先股，为收购瞻博网络（Juniper Networks）提供资金。【原文：Hewlett Packard Enterprise's shares dropped 6.4% in extended trading after the AI server maker announced a $1.35 billion mandatory convertible preferred stock offering to fund its acquisition of Juniper Networks .】

item.title: 诉讼称特洁安避孕套含有 "永久性化学物质
item.description: 本周一的一项新诉讼声称，特洁安避孕套不安全，因为它们含有有毒的 "永久化学品"，而这种化学品与癌症有关。【原文：A new lawsuit on Monday claims that Trojan condoms are not safe because they contain toxic "forever chemicals," which have been linked to cancer.】
